attributes.action: Protect the right of under 21 year olds to live with there UK partners
attributes.additional_details:
This petition relates to the recent judgement of the supreme court to scrap the blanket ban on under 21 year olds to attain a visa to live with there spouse, whether they are legally married or not, breaking there basic human right to a family life.

This petition is about protecting the rights of the British citizen to have a family life.

http://www.guardian.co.uk/uk/2011/oct/12/visa-ban-spouses-human-rights?newsfeed=true

While this rule has been judged illegal by the supreme court our government believes that we still want it. So lets let them know we disagree.

A blanket ban on visas for young people from non-EU countries is no replacement for proper checks and restrictions on lawful migrants.
